Weightless Scale Mail

armor (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 206
armor id [armor]: 50 (Weightless Scale)
protection, body [protbody]: 11
national discount [nationrebate]: #60 MA Vanheim - Arrival of Man
#20 EA Vanheim - Age of Vanir

Requires 10A to forge (A2)

Weightless Scale Mail is the armor of choice for any magician. The fine scales are enchanted with Air magic, making the armor almost weightless.
